SEARCH
Package main.java.mvc.model.Ship

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
main.java.mvc.model.Ship.Ship
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ship1, Ship2, Ship3, Ship4
public class Ship extends Object
Class Ship Represents a ship in the game. A ship has a name, a length, a position (bowRow, bowColumn), a direction (horizontal or vertical) and a number of hit boxes. A ship can be hit by a shot. A ship can be sunk. A ship can be placed on the board. A ship can be moved on the board. A ship can be rotated on the board. A ship can be removed from the board.
